I can not put to words how infuriating and terrible this game is. Not only are the game mechanics terrible, the hit detection makes roblox look like a decent first person shooter. Valve completely destroyed this game and burned it to the ground. The danger zone update not only turned the fps 5v5 into a garbage attempt at a battle-royale, it made the game free to hackers, and gave all purchased accounts before the update prime status. That means that when I try and introduce the game to my friends, the first game we play we get queued with hackers, greifers, smurfers, or all of the above. The community in this game is relentlessly toxic, and valve being valve chooses to do nothing about their most valuable multiplayer game. If you're looking to buy this game, take it from a guy who has played this game for almost 200 hours, and has spent around 200 dollars on it. Save yourself the hassle, the lost brain cells, the countless and pointless hours spent trying to rank up, the aneurysms from playing with and against hackers or greifers, and do not buy this pile of garbage game.
